snippet: Jonas Blixt, the defending champion, shot a six-under-par 64 to take a one-stroke lead through the first round of the Greenbrier Classic in West Virginia.
abstract: Jonas Blixt takes first-round lead in Greenbrier Classic in West Virginia; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jonas Blixt, the defending champion, shot a six-under-par 64 to take a one-stroke lead through the first round of the Greenbrier Classic in West Virginia.
